title: Are you an aspiring game artist? Join us!
summary: We are seeking a passionate and skilled pixel artist to join us as a long-term partner. Initial compensation is based on a revenue sharing model, but we are committed to creating games in a realistic way, starting with games small in scope. This is an opportunity to be part of a startup from the ground up and share in the rewards of our collective efforts. If you share our passion and enthusiasm, we encourage you to join the community and get in touch!
